relation: Returns a Boolean value that is associated with the database adapter base.
Returns the volume name as it appears in the PATH variable.
textBeforeTable: Methods Gets or sets a value that indicates whether database is set to Trustworthy. Trustworthy Returns target recovery time setting of a database. TargetRecoveryTime Gets the database status. Status Gets the database size in megabytes (MB). Size Gets or sets the database adapter recovery model. RecoveryModel Gets or sets a value that indicates whether database is set to read-only. ReadOnly Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the PageVerify setting is set to checksum. PageVerify Gets a Datetime object that indicates the time of the last log backup. LastLogBackupDate Gets a Datetime object that indicates the time of the last backup.
textAfterTable: Thread Safety Any public static (Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe. Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
